thread.title: ICICI Bank Says RBI Imposed Penalty On Bank For Continued Sale Of Govt Securities Classified As HTM‍​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: ICICI Bank Says RBI Imposed Penalty On Bank For Continued Sale Of Govt Securities Classified As HTM‍​

organizations.name: icici bank says rbi imposed penalty on bank for continued sale of govt securities

text:
March 29 (Reuters) - ICICI Bank Ltd:
* SAYS RBI HAS IMPOSED A PENALTY ON BANK FOR CONTINUED SALE OF GOVERNMENT SECURITIES CLASSIFIED AS HTM‍​
* SAYS CONTINUED WITH SALES FROM HTM CATEGORY FOR A FEW WEEKS DURING QUARTER ENDED MARCH 2017
* SAYS CONTINUED SALES "DUE TO GENUINE MISUNDERSTANDING ON TIMING OF APPLICABILITY OF RBI'S DIRECTION IN THIS MATTER" Source text: bit.ly/2IdCie7 Further company coverage:
